details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.11 Use of alternate presentations and transitions - AlternatePresentations
details.description: There shall be no AlternatePresentations entry in the document's name dictionary

rule.description: There shall be no AlternatePresentations entry in the document's name dictionary

error.message: The document's name dictionary contains the AlternatePresentations entry
